name: Terrorist in Trouble Town
description:
Before start answer few questions

1.Do you like Trouble in terrorist town?

2.No One wants to play with you?

3.Don't you have any friends?

If you said Yes for any of this questions this game could be your solution.

How to play

Every night npc's will get information about someone else and information can be true but don't have to(about 75% to be true).

You can ask 3 questions in one day to find who terrorist is and kill him.

At the end of the night you'll see if terrorist is dead or if he killed someone.

There's one special role among npc's called guard.

He can help you defend someone during night.

There's few ways to cheese this game but where's the fun in telling you ;)

Made for theme "Melancholy" (this is a sad town with a killer on the loose)
